page.title: 07Education In Steyning
page.content: There are{4}schools in Steyning. {1}St. Andrews Primary School, Shooting Field. {2}Steyning Lower Grammar School, Church Street. {3}Steyning Upper Grammar School, Shooting Field. {4}Southdown Preparatory School, Jarvis Lane. {St.Andrews}has several classrooms in the form of huts.There are{2}parts to the school, an infant department and a junior department.The school owns a swimming pool and a large playing field.The{Grammar School}is split into 2 parts ( The{Upper School}& the{Lower {School}).The{Lower School}was built in {1614}by{William Holland}and is in Church Street .The{Upper School}is a more recent development and is situated next to the{Primary School.}
